main event: A group of 7 white objects appeared to be stationary, then moved northeast. Two more objects appeared from the north, appeared to be stationary, then moved northeast. One object appeared to lens, and other objects appeared in the area which then traveled to the northwest where it disappeared behind trees.
interesting points: The objects were observed for a total duration of 30 minutes.
The objects were at various elevations and appeared to be stationary before moving.
One of the objects appeared to lens, but there was no flash.
The sighting was reported in a newspaper.
There were two additional objects that appeared from the north, were stationary, then moved northeast.
sighted object: group of white objects, shiny silvery sphere
